OBSERVER_ID.description: Unique identifier for the observation OBSERVER -  [Specific CCSDS Document]

OBSERVER_X.description: Cartesian X coordinate of the OBSERVER location in chosen reference frame

OBSERVER_Y.description: Cartesian Y coordinate of the OBSERVER location in chosen reference frame

OBSERVER_Z.description: Cartesian Z coordinate of the OBSERVER location in chosen reference frame

OBSERVER_VX.description: Cartesian X coordinate of the OBSERVER velocity in chosen reference frame

OBSERVER_VY.description: Cartesian Y coordinate of the OBSERVER velocity in chosen reference frame

OBSERVER_VZ.description: Cartesian Z coordinate of the OBSERVER velocity in chosen reference frame

OBSERVER_POSITION_REFERENCE_FRAME.description: Reference frame used for OBSERVER location Cartesian coordinates (e.g., ECEF, ECI)

OBS_REFERENCE_FRAME.description: Reference frame used for obs location Cartesian coordinates (e.g., ECEF, ECI)

EPOCH.description: Epoch time or observation time, in ISO 8601 UTC format -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1

CCSDS_TDM_VERS.description: TDM version number -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

COMMENT.description: Comments regarding TDM -  various sections, e.g., Page D-9

CREATION_DATE.description: Date of TDM creation -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

ORIGINATOR.description: Originator of the TDM -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

META_START.description: Start of metadata section -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

TIME_SYSTEM.description: Time system used -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

START_TIME.description: Start time of the data -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

STOP_TIME.description: Stop time of the data -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PARTICIPANT_1.description: First participant in the TDM -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PARTICIPANT_2.description: Second participant in the TDM -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PARTICIPANT_3.description: Third participant in the TDM (if applicable) -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PARTICIPANT_4.description: Fourth participant in the TDM (if applicable) -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PARTICIPANT_5.description: Fifth participant in the TDM (if applicable) -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9, max participants

MODE.description: Mode of TDM -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PATH_1.description: First path in TDM -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

PATH_2.description: Second path in TDM (if applicable) -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

RECEIVE_DELAY_2.description: Receive delay for second participant -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

RECEIVE_DELAY_3.description: Receive delay for third participant -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

META_STOP.description: End of metadata section -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

DATA_START.description: Start of data section -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

TRANSMIT_FREQ_1.description: Transmit frequency for first participant -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

DATA_STOP.description: End of data section -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-9

TIMETAG_REF.description:
Additional properties as required by the specific application of the TDM...
Reference for time tagging -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-10

ANGLE_TYPE.description:
Type of angle data -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-12
Can be AZEL, RADEC, XEYN, XSYE, or another value with provided ICD

ANGLE_1.description: First angle value -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-12

ANGLE_2.description: Second angle value -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-12

RANGE_RATE.description: Rate of change of range -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1

RANGE_MODE.description: Mode of range data -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-10

RANGE_MODULUS.description: Modulus value for range data -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-10

CORRECTION_ANGLE_1.description: First correction angle -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-12

CORRECTION_ANGLE_2.description: Second correction angle -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-12

CORRECTIONS_APPLIED.description: Indicator of corrections applied -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-12

TROPO_DRY.description: Dry component of tropospheric delay -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-14

TROPO_WET.description: Wet component of tropospheric delay -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-14

STEC.description: Slant total electron content -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-13

CLOCK_BIAS.description: Clock bias values -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-15

CLOCK_DRIFT.description: Clock drift values -  CCSDS 503.0-B-1, Page D-15
